item.title: Large overgrown tree, invested with Ivy, that requires pruning & health check, 25th January
item.description:
This tree is riddled with ivy, overgrown, consistently dropping large branches as well as blocking significant sunlight into neighbouring gardens. The health of the tree is a concern. also any large vehicle hits the branches of the tree causing more damage.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greycot Road, New Beckenham, Greater London
